Fall 2016 Topic List

In reverse chronological order. A more detailed outline can be found here. The GitHub repository corresponding to these lectures can be found here.

1. Data Manipulation and Data Visualization

  • Fri Sep 16 - Lec03: Loading CSV's and dplyr joins.
  • Wed Sep 14 - Lec02: More dplyr and basic webscraping.
  • Mon Sep 12 - Lec01: Data manipulation with dplyr.
  • Mon Sep 12 - Getting Started: We go over the syllabus, discuss what data science is, and set up the software/accounts for the course.

Albert Y. Kim's Webpage. The source code for this webpage is available on GitHub.
